short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apheleia - A Modern New Tab Page by @ikeyurp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace your New Tab Page with a personal dashboard. Apheleia turns your Browser's New Tab page into a beautiful personal dashboard. This helps you to stay organized and get more done in less time.

You can use Apheleia Extension in all browsers (eg. Firefox, Safari, Edge, Opera)

────────────────────────────

What functionality does Apheleia extension offer?

✔ Changes your New Tab page to Apheleia
✔ Allows you to search
✔ Integrate OpenAI's API to use AI features
✔ Supports all major search engines (eg. Google, Yandex, DuckDuckGo, Bing, Brave)
✔ More features coming soon...

If you have any feedback, bugs or issues, we're always listening on our support channel: support@ikeyurp.com
